moves.1. d4 d5 2. Nc3 Nf6: Thought I'd hold off on the Queens gambit.
moves.3. Bf4 e6 4. Bg5 c5: Nows the time for the queens gambit.
moves.5. Bxf6: Don't think there was any need for this as I can introduce my queen.
moves.5... Qxf6 6. dxc5 Bxc5 7. e3 Nc6 8. Nb5: Saw the check coming with the knight, so decided it was a good time to castle and get rook involved.
Waste of a move bringing the queen out and putting it back!
moves.12... Bb4+: He resigned here! He would have to Qd2, then I would take his queen with mine which would be checkmate.
